episode.content: In this episode, we're bringing you the newest beauty trends, from hairstyles to makeup! Plus, we talk to young adults particular about their hair salons and a men's beauty YouTuber. And you won't want to miss an exclusive makeup tutorial from a famous hair and makeup artist!
episode.description: The latest beauty trend in Tokyo is more diverse than ever! Learn some unique beauty services that you probably didn't know. Also, meet a makeup artist & hairstylist, who found a new way of working.
episode.subtitle: Kawaii Beauty After 2020: New Ideals & Trends
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: Since we're spending more and more time at home due to COVID-19, why not enrich your life with plants? This time we'll show you unique and trendy florists, as well as give you some terrarium building tips from a moss fanatic!
episode.description: In addition to adding beauty to your home and purifying the air, indoor plants also help ease your mind. Learn some kawaii ways to live with plants at home.
episode.subtitle: Planting Seeds of Joy: Plant Life at Home
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: Since we are spending more time at home, cleaning items have become all the rage. We'll introduce you to the latest cleaning products! We also feature a person addicted to old-fashioned brooms and a cleaning specialist who will share some tips about removing stains. Plus, Bolivian-based influencer Kazumi tells us about her "Harajuku Fashion Walk in Bolivia," an online event during the COVID-19 pandemic.
episode.description: Make your daily cleaning routine more fun! In this episode, a cleaning pro gives some easy stain removal tips. Plus, Kawaii Leader Kazumi performs "Kawaii Hand Washing Challenge" with her friends!
episode.subtitle: Clean and Kawaii: Have Fun Cleaning Up!
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: In this episode, we'll give you a look at some stylish and kawaii bedrooms, from rooms for relaxation to our hosts, Misha and RinRin's bedrooms! A sleep expert joins to take a look at our hosts' rooms. Plus, the first round Kawaii Leader Judy will give us an update on the COVID-19 situation in Taiwan.
episode.description: Tired of tossing and turning at night? Learn some kawaii ways to help you sleep better and be more productive during the day. Also, Kawaii Leader Judy greets us with "Kawaii Hand Washing Challenge."
episode.subtitle: My Favorite Room is My Bedroom!
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: Join us and learn about the fashion industry's virtual evolution! Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, many fashion shows are going online! A leader in the fashion world GUNJI Sayumi tells us about the merits of online shows. Plus, fashion journalist MATSUSHITA Kumi gives us her insight into the virtual human trend.
episode.description: Learn how to enjoy Augmented Reality fashion show at home using your smartphones! Also, discover virtual Try-On technology, which helps you find clothes or eyeglasses that suit you the best.
episode.subtitle: The Virtual Generation: Part 1
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: We learn about the most popular games in the world, online avatar fashion and how virtual reality communities mingle and have fun. We also talk to a charismatic retail avatar about the benefits of connecting with customers online.
episode.description: We take a look at virtual reality's role in the fashion industry - virtual clothes, avatars, and more! Also, a charismatic retail avatar talks about the benefits of connecting with customers online.
episode.subtitle: The Virtual Generation: Part 2
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: In this episode, we introduce you to the latest Japanese food trends! We take a look back at drinks and sweets that trended in the past, as well as the latest crazes! This episode will tell you everything you need to know about trendy Japanese food! Plus, Ran, a bread artist who has gone viral on social media, shows off her bread-making skills.
episode.description: From tapioca boba tea to rainbow-colored cotton candy, we take a look at a decade of kawaii sweets trends. What will be the next big food and drink trend? Watch and find out!
episode.subtitle: Yum! Tokyo's Top Treat Trends!
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: Miniature items have long been popular in Japan, and on this episode, we're featuring the latest trends! We'll introduce you to different ways of enjoying miniatures as well as unique capsule toys. Also, our reporter Mr. Yabatan will try making miniature food for the first time!
episode.description: While at home during the COVID-19 pandemic, finding new indoor hobbies are a must. How about making miniature dioramas with detailed furniture inside? Watch the episode to find out more!
episode.subtitle: We're Obsessed with Miniatures!
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: This episode brings you the latest mask fashion trends, a must-have item in the fight against the pandemic. We'll introduce you to some mask specialty shops as well as the popular mask accessories. Also, we check out some of the world's most innovative fashion products created during the pandemic.
episode.description: During COVID-19, face masks not only help us protect the people around us, but they can also be a great fashion accessory! Find out how fashionistas blend virus protection items into their look.
episode.subtitle: Love for Fashion in the Age of Covid
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: The keyword for this episode is "diversity." We feature stylish and barrier-free fashion items of the future, as well as some fashion leaders in genderless Kawaii style. Also, don't miss our interview with Amane, an up-and-coming model with a prosthetic leg.
episode.description: Kawaii culture has no boundaries - express yourself and embrace who you are! Our hosts Misha and RinRin will guide you to figure out how to let your uniqueness shine.
episode.subtitle: The Extraordinary Diversity of Kawaii
episode.title: Kawaii International

episode.content: After a long run of 9 years on the air, Kawaii International is coming to an end. In this final episode, we will update you about Kawaii fans and communities around the globe. Our special guest, MASUDA Sebastian, joins us as we report on what the Kawaii community leaders and influencers are up to during COVID-19 pandemic.
episode.description: For our very last show, Misha, RinRin, and MASUDA Sebastian discuss the future of Kawaii culture. Also, Kelly Eden and Rosalynn join online as special guests to share what Kawaii means to them.
episode.subtitle: The Future of Kawaii is YOURS
episode.title: Kawaii International
